title.@value: Patient received diagnostic test or treatment intended for another patient without injury or harm

definition.@value:
Patient order for testing or treatment performed on wrong patient (e.g. lab test, diagnostic imaging test, physical or psychological therapy, dressing change, irrigation, etc.).

Patient received drug or medicament meant for another patient, but no harm resulted.

label.@value: Patient received diagnostic test or treatment intended for another patient
Patient received diagnostic test or treatment intended for another patient without injury or harm
Wrong patient received diagnostic test or treatment without injury or harm
incorrect patient received diagnostic test or treatment without injury or harm
